lines.text:
[Ace checks himself out of the hospital]
You just can't walk out of here!
You see my feet on the floor, don't you Arlis? Now watch my legs make 'em move.
Oh, I'm heaven bound, sweetheart, but not today.
That was a nice float you had, Curley.

[proudly]
Finished second in the commercial division.
Junior, you're my brother, and I guess I love you. Well, we're family. I don't care what you do. You can sell one lot or a hundred lots. I'm just tryin' to keep us together.
I gotta go down my own road.
What road? I mean, I'm workin' on my first million, and you're still workin' on eight seconds.
By hook or by crook, I'm goin' to Australia.
Well, you always were good at puttin' distance between us.
As far as I'm concerned, you can go to hell or Australia, but not with me!
Didn't you always save the first dance for mom, Ace?
Boys, times have changed. I changed them.
